bcRoom - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This field holds the Room containing a bomb
BRIEFCASE_NAME - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Room
This field represents a constant String containing "[B]", the symbol for a bomb.
briefcasePos - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This field represents an int[] containing the coordinates of the bomb
briefcaseRoom - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Room
This field represents a boolean that is true when the Room contains the bomb and false otherwise.
